price: Glorificado seja O Senhor dos céus e da terra, O Senhor do Trono, acima do que eles alegam!
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
